body.name: Sony XR85Z9K 85" 8K BRAVIA XR HDR Mini LED Smart TV with an Additional 4 Year Coverage by Epic Protect (2022)
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: INTELLIGENT TV PROCESSING – The Cognitive Processor XR understands how humans see to deliver intense contrast with deep blacks, high peak brightness, and natural colors

MINI LED CONTRAST– Thousands of Mini LEDs are controlled with absolute precision by XR Backlight Master Drive delivering unprecedented contrast with deep blacks, natural colors, and maximum brightness

PERFECT FOR PLAYSTATION 5 – Take your gaming to the next level with input lag as low as 8.5ms and BRAVIA XR exclusive features for the PlayStation 5 – Auto HDR Tone Mapping & Auto Genre Picture Switch
FEATURES SPECIFIED IN HDMI 2.1– Get the advantage in high-performance gaming on BRAVIA XR TVs with HDMI 2.1 features such as 4K/120,10 VRR, and ALLM
5 Year Additional Epic Protect Coverage in Addition to the Included Full Manufacturer Coverage. Intended for Residential Use Only
body.description: Epic Protect Coverage Features & Benefits Mechanical & Electrical FailuresPower Surge ProtectionNationwide Network of Service Providers24/7/365 Customer Support, and more. When does the plan begin? All plans begin from date of purchase and are inclusive of the manufacturer's limited coverage. Benefits such as Power Surge Protection and Mechanical & Electrical Failures (if purchased) begin on Day 1. What items are eligible for Epic Protect? Electronics with at least a 90 day manufacturer limited coverage in the United States.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sony Z9K Series TV with Epic Protect Extended Coverage Sony Z9K 8K BRAVIA XR - Anti-Reflection - BRAVIA Camera - Acoustic Multi-Audio - Voice Assist - Contrast Enhancement: XR Backlight Master Drive, XR Contrast Booster, XR HDR Remaster, Dynamic Contrast Enhancer - Color Enhancement: XR TRILUMINOS PRO, XR Super Resolution - Clarity Enhancement: XR 8K Upscaling, XR Super Resolution - Motion Enhancer: XR Motion Clarity - Ambient Optimization Pro - Smart Remote - 3 way multi-position stand - Creator Calibrated Mode - Netflix Adaptive Calibrated Mode - 1 Tuner - Display Resolution: 7680 x 4320 - Display Type: LCD - X-Wide Angle - Panel Refresh Rate: 120 Hz - Picture Processor: Cognitive Processor XR - Built-in Mic Switch - Electronic Program Guide - On-Board Storage (GB): 16GB - Sound Modes: Standard, Dialog, Theater, Music, Sports, Dolby Audio - Acoustic Multi-Audio Frame Tweeter - WiFi - 1 USB Port - (Titanium Silver) This bundle consists of one (1) Sony Z9K 8K BRAVIA XR with a 1-Year, 2-Year, OR 4-Year Additional Epic Protect Coverage in Addition to the Included Full Manufacturer Coverage. Intended for Residential Use Only

Uncompromising 8K realism on a big screen With Cognitive Processor XR and the new 8K Mini LED, the Z9K upscales any content close to 8K resolution so you can enjoy more detail and texture on a big screen, alongside ultimate contrast. Feel your senses pushed to the limit and experience TV like you've never experienced it before

Scenes full of contrast and brightness, precisely controlled Powered by Cognitive Processor XR, the unique XR Backlight Master Drive precisely controls the latest generation Mini LED backlight in this Z9K 8K BRAVIA XR TV for brightness you can feel. You'll enjoy an unprecedented dynamic range with incredibly dazzling lights and deep blacks, as well as beautifully natural mid tones, with almost no flare or halos around highlights

Sound from the screen, pictures and sound in harmony Enjoy sound that precisely matches what's on screen with Acoustic Multi-Audio technology. Sound positioning tweeters ensure pictures and sound are in harmony for an immersive viewing experience

Hands-free help from Google With hands-free voice control built into Google TV, you can set aside your remote and simply use your voice to control your TV. Ask Google to find a specific title, search by genre, and get personalized recommendations on what to watch by saying, "Hey Google, what should I watch?"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: There’s nothing this tv can do that my $500 one couldn’t. Literally. You’re just paying for the size of it.
